publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3724 Ms Margaret Curran on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Designation of Lead Committeeâ€”That the Parliament agrees that the Environment and Rural Development Committee be designated as lead committee, and that the Justice 2 Committee be designated as secondary committee, in consideration of the draft Scotland Act 1998 (Transfer of Functions to the Scottish Ministers etc.) Order 2006. Supported by: George Lyon*
